title: A Uniform Resource Name (URN) Namespace for the Society of Motion Picture and Television Engineers (SMPTE)
abstract:
This document describes a Uniform Resource Name (URN) namespace for
the Society of Motion Picture and Television Engineers (SMPTE) for
naming persistent resources that SMPTE produces or manages.  A
subnamespace for Universal Labels is specifically described.  This memo provides information for the Internet community.
